thread.section_title: CarpetVista.de Bewertungen | Kundenbewertungen von CarpetVista.de | www.carpetvista.de | 7 von 198
thread.title: Kim

author: Kim
title: Kim
text:
The Carpet is very pleasing.
Quality looks and feels quite good. The colours are just as described and shown in the picture.
Delivery time is very quick. I ordered the rug the same day as it got dispatched (Thursday) and it got delivered in the mail on Tuesday early afternoon.
The one and only downside is that the carpet was folded in half right across the middle, in order to be packed and delivered, which isn't too bad as the crease will disappear over time. But then again it could be avoided by packing and shipping it differently.
Overall I'm more than happy with my Indian Loribaf. Anytime I would recommend this site to anyone who is on the hunt for a carpet or rug. And I would reorder anytime on this very reliable site. Thank you!!
